name: Cheese Chaser Champ
description:
No ads or in-app purchases

The Game:
If you enjoy playing with pets, like food, and avoiding obstacles to become the Cheese Chaser Champ, this is the right game for you.

The goal of the game is to avoid obstacles by tapping the screen to move forward. The game has several levels of increasing difficulty and each level is unique. You will notice all sorts of foods scattered all over the game field. Collect these foods which are the game’s currency and will help you to unlock other items that will help your progress:

Items:
Champ: No coins needed to activate
Compass: 10000 coins to activate
First Aid Kit: 20000 coins to activate
Flashlight: 30000 coins to activate
Bag: 50000 coins to activate

Happy Playing!
